title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 06 January 2015 - XWiki
content:
<Lyes> has quit  
00:47 <Lyes> has joined #xwiki  
02:30 <Lyes> has quit  
02:31 <Lyes> has joined #xwiki

09:41 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
09:46 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:09 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:15 <vmassol> good morning  
10:15 <vmassol> on the batch mail side, we still need this morning to finish something that works and merge it on master.  
10:24 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
11:19 <cjd> has quit  
11:34 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
11:34 <cjd> is now known as <Guest53730>  
11:37 <Guest53730> is now known as <\_cjd>  
12:27 <ericq> has joined #xwiki  
12:28 <ericq> has quit  
12:37 <vmassol> evalica: almost there  
12:38 <evalica> :) k  
12:38 <evalica> I will go to lunch soon  
12:38 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
12:46 <gdelhumeau> issue with http://vmassol.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/WebHome  
12:46 <gdelhumeau> "This Wiki does not exist on this server."  
12:47 <lucaa> has quit  
13:21 <vmassol> need 10 more minutes  
13:30 <vmassol> ok merging branch to master now  
13:43 <vmassol> ok done  
13:43 <vmassol> let's hope the build passes (I'm rebuilding XE to be sure it works fine)  
13:44 <vmassol> ah it does fail, I missed something  
13:54 <vmassol> found a problem, wait  
13:55 <vmassol> hmm no should be ok actually  
14:13 <vmassol> evalica: we're done on the mail for 6.4M3  
14:14 <vmassol> thanks for waiting and sorry  
14:14 <evalica> k - so now we wait for the build to pass, right?  
14:14 <evalica> and after I can start  
14:14 <vmassol> if you want, I've tested it locally though so should be ok  
14:15 <vmassol> off to lunch now!  
14:40 <evalica> vmassol: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform\_Quality\_Checks/  Coverage checks have not been met.  
14:42 <evalica> Lyes: can you add some documentation for http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11486 in the Release Notes http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWiki64M3  
14:55 <vmassol> evalica: fixed  
14:55 <vmassol> thanks  
14:55 <vmassol> (strange though since I had checked it)  
14:55 <vmassol> (maybe we had some new commits after, I don't recall)  
14:58 <evalica> vmassol: thanks  
14:59 <msmeria> has quit  
15:01 <tmortagne> evalica: thanks, totally forgot to put the links after I updated the release note  
15:03 <evalica> tmortagne: np - thanks anyway for filling the info. Still I guess I will mark the step in release plan as incomplete, until Victor fixes it, when he will be back  
15:04 <tmortagne> ok  
15:05 <vmassol> adding doc and notes now  
15:07 <evalica> thanks  
17:01 <vmassol> evalica: doc done for http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11486  
17:02 <evalica> vmassol: great - thanks - you have a broken link  
17:02 <vmassol> oh  
17:02 <evalica> in release notes  
17:03 <vmassol> indeed  
17:03 <vmassol> fixed  
17:03 <vmassol> thanks  
17:03 <evalica> thanks :) I'm waiting for the tests - and after launch the build
